## dedent() function

Remove common leading whitespace from text.

Detects the minimum indentation (count of leading whitespace characters) across all non-empty lines and removes that many characters from each line. Whitespace-only lines are stripped entirely.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function dedent(s: string): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

s


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The text to dedent


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The dedented text

## Example


```ts
const text = `
    Hello
    World
`;
dedent(text);
// "\nHello\nWorld\n"
```
